title.i: We are now interested in understanding what type of devices you typically use.
title.b: Which of the following types have you used at least once during the past month?

row.label: r1

div.i: You may click on the image to see a larger view.

row.b: Small replaceable non refillable pod inserted into rechargeable battery

row.label: r2

div.i: You may click on the image to see a larger view.

row.b: Large replaceable non refillable pod magnetically attached to a battery

row.label: r3

div.i: You may click on the image to see a larger view.

row.b: All in one unit, typically thrown away after use

row.label: r4

div.i: You may click on the image to see a larger view.

row.b: Advanced unit with replaceable heating coil that you fill with liquid

row.label: r5

div.i: You may click on the image to see a larger view.

row.b: Small replaceable pod that you can open and fill with liquid inserted into rechargeable battery
